abstracts.cdata!:
This restructuring paper responds to the
            request of the Government of Mexico (GOM) and introduces the
            following changes in the Mexico Tertiary Education Student
            Assistance Project. The accompanying amendments to the
            project legal documents: 1) change the formulation of the
            project development objective to reflect the elimination of
            student loan program as a mechanism of student assistance;
            2) eliminate the student loan program and private sector
            participation and recognize that subcomponent 2.1 will not
            be financed with the World Bank loan because the
            Government's Secretariat of Labor has fully implemented
            all of the elements in this subcomponent with its own
            financial resources; 3) reallocate funds from these (sub)
            components to other components; and 4) adjust result
            indicators to reflect these changes.
